triage.root_cause: from_dict() uses str() on non-string created_at/updated_at values, producing invalid timestamps like '123' or "{'a': 1}"
risk_points: Data corruption: invalid timestamps get stored
Downstream failures: code expecting ISO format may break
Silent failure: no validation error raised

fix.approach: Add explicit type validation for created_at/updated_at fields, similar to existing validation for id, text, and done fields

risks.limitations: Does not validate that string timestamps are valid ISO format - only validates type
